name: The Avalanches
description:
'''The Avalanches''' are an Australian [[electronic music]] group formed in [[Melbourne]] in 1997. They have released three studio albums, ''[[Since I Left You]]'' (2000), ''[[Wildflower (The Avalanches album)|Wildflower]]'' (2016), and ''[[We Will Always Love You]]'' (2020), and perform live and recorded DJ sets. The group currently consists of Robbie Chater and Tony Di Blasi. 

The band is an exponent of the [[plunderphonics]] genre, and their first album, ''Since I Left You,'' has been recognised by many critics as the most important example of the genre.
